text: All rights, privileges, or immunities conferred by this subchapter or by acts done pursuant thereto shall exist subject to the power of Congress to amend or repeal this subchapter at any time.
historical:

Current through December 11, 2012

part.text: Administration of the District Unemployment Fund.

heading.catch_text: Right to amend or repeal reserved.
